description: When recording songs with our band this application really helps us to master all the audio streams!
So many options, on par on some of the professional tools, and it's free!
Has this become non-free? On their download site, they now charge for pre-built packages.
A bit complicated at first, but works great.

This app is still free as in freedom, just not as in beer. All the source code is available and you can build it yourself; they're charging for the convenience. I think it's fair given the features this has, the cost of running the project, and the fact that pre-built versions can be found in repos like this.
summary: In reply to "John Doe" above me

description: If you find yourself bumping up against Audacity's limits, it's well worth investing a weekend to learn Ardour. Its flexibility and power is an order of magnitude greater.
Lots of features, sometimes a bit complicated. There is a learning curve if you want to be comfortable.
Ardour is installed by fail to open new project on Fedora31 even after updating software
summary: On Fedora31 it is not running

description:
'Could not create session in "/home/user/xy.." '

I try to create folder, but nothing.
Log say only: Cant create session... very useful log
Great app. Professional DAW. Supports plugins, complex routing, multiple busses.

You need to configure Jack if you can't open session. DuckDuckGo is your friend 
Otherwise this works as well as Cubase to produce audio tracks.

Yeah.. Why not to charge for "builds" after all, the source is there. Right? WRONG. If they want to charge for their builds, without any warranty I'd say that it does not work that way. By the way "the community that collaborates" are... who? are they paying them? Obscure and idiotic way to proceed.
Oh.. jack only on this one and jack is not working very well. Not a surprise at all. 

In this matter, if you are a sound producer better stick to the facts and go for windows. Linux has made huge steps in video editing. but not precisely on this matter.
Amazing app - far better than even some commercial/proprietary apps.
ich bekomm immer die Fehlermeldung, dass kein Projekt erstellt werden kann

bonjour ,
juste le multi-dupliquer qui ne fonctionne pas ! (pour le moment ;)

(un peu galere pour dupliquer un sample de batterie par exemple)

a part ca c'est ergonomique .

peut etre rajouter un clic droit qui selectionne objet avec option supprimer tout les objets de la piste direct, lors d'un enregistrement il est frequent qu'il faille refaire plusieurs prises...donc moins on manipule mieux c'est....

 pour ceux qui souhaiterait l'utiliser tout comme moi n'oublier pas de muter les pistes lors d'une session car le son ressort sur les enceintes de la sono .

sinon rien a envier a d'autres logiciels bien connu sous windows Ardour est super et le son enregistrer est de bonne qualité !

Magix samplitude ,protools et compagnie ont du soucis a se faire !

bravo a l'équipe qui a developé Ardour !

je suis impatient pour la suite avec des options de Mastering ca serait parfait !
Ergonomie affreuse, j'ai utilisé beaucoup de logiciels de MAO et aucun n'étaient aussi obscur... à réserver au plus courageux qui ne peuvent pas utiliser autre chose.
summary: Après 15 minutes je cherche toujours comment ajouter un instrument..
